ACM+SIGMETRICS: ACM Conf on Meas. & Modelling of Comp Sys
PDCAT: International Conference on Parallel and Distributed Computing, Applications and Technologies
IFIP+IM: IFIP/IEEE Integrated Management (odd years sharing with NOMS)
MOBIHOC: ACM Symposium of mobile and ad hoc computing
MOBICOM: ACM International Conferencem on Mobile Computing and Networking
HiPC: International Conference on High Performance Computing
IEEE+NOMS: IEEE Network Operations and Management Symposium
DISC: International Symposium on Distributed Computing (ex WDAG)
P2P: IEEE International Conference on Peer-toPeer Computing
EWSN: European conference on Wireless Sensor Networks
WiOpt: International. Symposium on Modeling and Optimization in Mobile, Ad Hoc, and Wireless Networks
IEEE+SECON: IEEE Conference on Sensor, Mesh and Ad Hoc Communications and Networks
EuroPDP: EUROMICRO Conference on Parallel, Distributed and Network-Based processing
HPCN: International Conference on High Performance Computing and Networking
PIMRC: IEEE International Symposium on Personal and Indoor Mobile Radio Conference
Qsine: International Conference on Quality of Service in Heterogeneous Wired/Wireless Networks
IPCCC: IEEE Intl Phoenix Conf on Comp & Communications
IPDPS: IEEE International Parallel and Distributed Processing Symposium (was IPPS and SPDP)
PODC: ACM Symp on Principles of Distributed Computing
ICPADS: IEEE International Conference on Parallel and Distributed Systems
ODP: IFIP International Conference on Open Distributed Processing
MSWIM: ACM/IEEE International Conference on Modelling, Analysis and Simulation of Wireless and Mobile Systems
OPENARCH: IEEE Conference on Open Architecture and Network Programming
WoWMoM: IEEE International Symposium on a World of Wireless, Mobile and Multimedia Networks
Broadnets: International Conference on Broadband Communications, Networks and Systems
MASS: IEEE International Conference on Mobile Ad-hoc and Sensor Systems
IC3N: International Conference on Computer Communication and Networks
SECON: IEEE Conference on Sensor, Mesh and Ad Hoc Communications and Networks
ACSAC: Australasian Computer Systems Architecture Conference (now Asia-Pacific Computer Systems Architecture Conference)
IFIP+PERFORMANCE: IFIP International Symposium on Computing Performance, Modelling, Measurement and Evaluation
Mobiquitous: International Conference on Mobile and Ubiquitous Systems Networks and Services
IWCMC: ACM International Wireless Communications and Mobile Computing Conference
RAID: Symposium on Recent Advances in Intrusion Detection
ACISP: Australasia Conference on Information Security and Privacy
ADHOC-NOW: International Conference on AD-HOC Networks & Wireless
HOTNETS: ACM Workshop on Hot Topics in Networks
HPDC: IEEE International Symposium on High Performance Distributed Computing
Mobisys: ACM SIGMOBILE International Conference on mobile systems, applications and services
PERFORMANCE: IFIP Intl Symp on Computer Performance, Modeling, Measurements & Evaluation (since 1980)
IEEE+INFOCOM: Joint Conference of the IEEE Computer and Communications Societies
DAIS: IFIP International Conference on Distributed Applications and Inoperable Systems
AWSAC: Annual Workshop on Selected Areas in Cryptography
ICDCS: IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems
WCNC: IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference
LATIN: International Symposium on Latin American Theoretical Informatics
PADS: ACM/IEEE/SCS Workshop on Parallel & Distributed Simulation
NOMS: IEEE Network Operations and Management Symposium
OPODIS: International Conference on Principles of Distributed Systems
AINA: International Conference on Advanced Information Networking and Applications (was ICOIN)
HPSR: IEEE Workshop on High Performance Switching and Routing
LCN: IEEE Annual Conference on Local Computer Networks
ACM+SIGCOMM: ACM Conference on Applications, Technologies,Architectures, and Protocols for Computer Communication
ICDCN: IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing and Networking
